General.Name: Future Fintech Group Inc
General.Description: Future FinTech Group Inc., through its subsidiaries, engages in supply-chain financing services and trading business in the People's Republic of China. It offers cross-border payment and money transfer services, and brokerage and investment banking, as well as engages in the trading of coal, aluminum ingots, sand, and steel. The company was formerly known as SkyPeople Fruit Juice, Inc. and changed its name to Future FinTech Group Inc. in June 2017. Future FinTech Group Inc. is headquartered in New York, New York.
General.Address: Americas Tower, New York, NY, United States, 10036

7.Name: Mr. Kai  Xu
